rules_text:
[i]Lowtide [/i]– At the beginning of your combat step, if you control three or less untapped Islands, untap target creature you control.
[i]Hightide[/i] – At the beginning of your combat step, if you control five or more untapped Islands, create two 1/1 blue Merfolk Rogue creature tokens, those tokens gain haste until end of turn.
